game.name: Sanxingdui Wonders
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

game.shortDescription: An Amazing Night in Sanxingdui​​ is a Guofeng anime-style puzzle-adventure game immersing players in ancient Shu culture.
